topic.title: Help:anyone has serv-u rev8?

1590839728_1LJkuyQtRzD9AJkUE1tAhCVFoLiHT.body:
> [ransbits](#comment_42_1H9xEgESUhfvpYK3SLLqabc1uLT2jsmH2A): Why not use a well tested open source solution to host a local FTP server? It would be providing the same thing without the use of such untrusted and unverified code (such as a crack)  https://filezilla-project.org/download.php?type=server

No  I do not use filzilla `Cause of its bad performance as it aften failed to start up.

purrpurr robione thank you all .However the EN source are gone.
The russian edition one is downloadable.I will give it a shot.
